news.title: November private payrolls unexpectedly fell by 32,000, led by steep small business job cuts, ADP reports
news.summary: The payrolls decline marked a sharp step down from October, which saw an upwardly revised gain of 47,000 positions. The decline was the first since September.

news.title: Macy’s posts strongest growth in more than 3 years, but strikes cautious note on holidays
news.summary: Macy's has seen signs of momentum as it invests in more staffing and sharper visual displays at its namesake department stores. Macy's is one of the largest department stores in the U.S.

news.title: Trump administration to announce new fuel economy standards Wednesday, sources say
news.summary: No description available. No description available for this model. For more information on this model, please visit: www.cruiseworld.com/cruisemodel.

news.title: Beyonce, Sydney Sweeney and a fight for relevance: How American Eagle, Gap and Levi sparked a new 'denim war'
news.summary: Levi Strauss, Gap and American Eagle are competing to corner the denim market. The ads featuring stars like Beyonce and Sydney Sweeney feature Beyonce.

news.title: Mortgage rates finally moved lower last week, but that didn't do much for demand
news.summary: Mortgage rates moved slightly lower last week after rising for much of the past month. But it wasn't a big enough move to impact mortgage demand.

news.title: ADP says U.S. economy loses jobs for third time in four months. Fed to weigh weak labor market in rate-cut vote.
news.summary: Privately run businesses eliminated jobs in November for the third time in four months. The slowdown in hiring threatens to nudge unemployment higher and undermine the economy.

news.title: An AI air pocket and a struggling consumer could become a double whammy for stocks in 2026, Bank of America predicts
news.summary: Don't look for outsized gains from the S&P 500 next year, the headwinds are numerous warns Savita Subramanian.

news.title: ‘She’ll let him live there for free’: My sister wants to buy our impoverished brother’s house. Is that a bad idea?
news.summary: “Her only concern is that it will show up as an asset or rental property on her end,” the lawyer says. “Her Only Concern is That It will Show Up as an Asset or rental Property on Her end.”

news.title: Sorry, retirees — the 4% rule won’t work for you if Vanguard is right about where the stock market is headed
news.summary: A ‘lost decade’ of low stock returns can be devastating for older investors. A “lost decade of lowStock returns’ could be devastating to older investors, experts say.

news.title: American Eagle had Sydney Sweeney. But its lesser-known lingerie brand carried the day.
news.summary: American Eagle raises outlook for the holiday quarter and the year on ‘strong momentum’ for sales. American Eagle: ‘We are in a strong position for the rest of the year’
